articles.description: A "cautious" approach to reopening is needed, Public Health England's Dr Susan Hopkins says.
articles.content:
media captionProf Susan Hopkins: "We have to relax things really quite slowly"
Ending the current coronavirus lockdown must happen "very slowly, very cautiously", Public Health England's Covid strat… [+4285 chars]
